item.title: The Local Storage Folder and Backups
item.description: The Local Store Folder Balsamiq Mockups 3 for Desktop creates a folder on your hard drive for storing some local data and preferences. It looks something like this: The easiest way to find it is by opening the “About” dialog and clicking on the “Open Local Store Folder” link. â€‹ For reference, here is the location of this folder on the various operating systems that Balsamiq Mockups for Desktop runs on:
